snippet: After the Bison squandered a 9-point lead in the fourth quarter against Illinois State, Carson Wentz led a 78-yard drive and eased into the end zone for the winning score.
abstract: College Football Roundup; North Dakota State defeats Illinois State, 29-27, becoming first team to win four straight Football Championship Subdivision titles; other college football news noted.
lead_paragraph: After the Bison squandered a 9-point lead in the fourth quarter against Illinois State, Carson Wentz led a 78-yard drive and eased into the end zone for the winning score.

headline.print_headline: North Dakota State Wins a 4th Straight Title
headline.main: North Dakota State Wins 4th Straight Football Championship Subdivision Title
